title: Black Screen 2x in a row
body: Got a black screen, got leaverbuster for it during champ select. Uninstalled, reinstalled, patched, went at it again. Guess what? A SECOND ONE IN A ROW. Thank you, Riot, for the 30 minute leaverbuster and -6 lp all in one! Beautiful.

replies.body: Is this happening in the Beta Client or the Legacy Client?

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=nx9VxKAx,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2017-02-27T02:22:20.084+0000)
>
> Is this happening in the Beta Client or the Legacy Client?

It's the Beta Client.

Gotcha. This is a known issue with the Beta Client that only affects the transition between queue and champ select. Since the 'collapsing friends list' workaround didn't work for you, I recommend using the Legacy Client (from login) for now:

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/article_attachments/215576628/Launch-Legacy-Client.jpg

I hope this cleared up the confusion.
someone said that minimizing your friends list just before you queue up has worked as a work around for them, seems worth a try since im in the same boat as you.
